TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
3 hours ago, kerbiloid said:

I wish to continue.

Boom. Explosion. 

I wish to banish Kerbals to Eeloo. 

Edited April 28, 2021 by Dr. Kerbal

Granted, But Dr. Kerbal and Shepley Kerman are the only ones banished.

I wish my SSTOs would work

Granted, but they only work when the're 5 meters above the ground.

 

 

I wish for my wish to come true

Granted, however I change my mind a nanosecond later.

I wish for more KSP DLCs

2 hours ago, Stormpilot said:

I wish for more KSP DLCs

but the DLC cost 100M+100m+100M+100m+ INFINITE$

i wish i could bury a house with one shovel in one go

granted, but you bury yourself alive

 

I wish Tintin was real

but Tintin was not real

 

i wish i could dive to the deepest place in the mariana trench

Granted. You are a lobster.

I wish for 24 kg of dysprosium. Just to look, how does this look like.

Edited April 30, 2021 by kerbiloid

but  you need to find it and you didn't find it anywhere

i wish 0.00000000000000001% of mars is land

8 hours ago, JB182 said:

but  you need to find it and you didn't find it anywhere

i wish 0.00000000000000001% of mars is land

The square meter of land you’re standing on suddenly teleports to Mars... and you too!

 

I wish that Mars had some water

Granted. Mars had some water.

I wish Perseverance had found Vikings and asked them what happened there.

Edited April 30, 2021 by kerbiloid

but Persevarnece detroyed by the Vikings and exploded

i wish british could launch black arrow again

Granted. You go to the archery tournament.

I wish the red and other arrow s get launched, too.

but they are armed with warheds and are targted at your house

(some of them were actualy missles)

also eirler someone wnated water on mars. well we have already found water on mars

But the water turned out to be Sprite.

I wish to get a brand new Liebherr LTM 1030-2.1 with a New Pig vehicle spill kit, cone holder filled with a stack of 28" reflective traffic cones, towing a trailer with a Cat 430F2 backhoe on it. There is also a bag of pretzels and 2 packages of doppel keks on the front seat of the crane.

The Liebherr LTM 1030-2.1 with the Cat 430F2 arrives at your doorstep. However it is made of chocolate and it melts and dose not work. At least you have a snack, oh wait, its explosive chocolate. BOOM!!!

I wish for a fully working fueled up, armed and ready to go MI-24W(V) soviet attack/ transport helicopter with the 40mm auto cannon, Surface to ground missiles, and four rocket pods.

3 minutes ago, Stormpilot said:

I wish for a fully working fueled up, armed and ready to go MI-24W(V) soviet attack/ transport helicopter with the 40mm auto cannon, Surface to ground missiles, and four rocket pods.

Granted, but since you don't know how to fly a helicopter, it's a expensive paperweight.

I'm contemplating a want for my car parts to appear at my doorstep and due to a billing error, they're FREE! (BMW's are not cheap to fix. Working on them isn't bad, just $$$)

7 minutes ago, GDJ said:

Granted, but since you don't know how to fly a helicopter, it's a expensive paperweigh.

I know how to fly a helicopter! I just sorta don’t have a licence yet.

Granted. You get one part, which is a broken headlight light bulb.

I wish for a fully armed ready to go T-55 tank.

2 hours ago, Stormpilot said:

The Liebherr LTM 1030-2.1 with the Cat 430F2 arrives at your doorstep. However it is made of chocolate and it melts and dose not work. At least you have a snack, oh wait, its explosive chocolate. BOOM!!!

Wow, that really was horribly corrupted! 

Anyway, The tank arrived, but was fueled up with the same explosive chocolate that the LTM 1030 and 430F2 were constructed of. 

I hope to find a stack of reflective, brand new 28" inch traffic cones on the side of the road that fell off somebody's truck. Traffic cones are pretty expensive.

Edited May 3, 2021 by Ben J. Kerman

Granted. You downloaded VLC as many times as you could and resize its icon up to 28 inch.

I wish each atom had a label.

Hey, I use VLC media player! It is great; It plays almost every kind of video file out there, it has a bunch of different settings, it has a traffic cone as its icon, and it's free! You buy a package of Avery AtomLabels, but they don't stick well, cost too much, and your printer isn't compatible with them or something.

I wish that construction equipment wasn't so expensive.

I will take a break from this thread so I am not in every other post!

Granted, most of the new buildings you used with the Cheap equipment to construct,have been self exploded,due to the low cost and maintenance of the product manufactured by the designer.

Ergo: Cheap = Weak.

Expensive = Strong.

I wish for a bucket of chicken.

Granted. You get a mini excavator bucket with 1 live chicken in it.

I wish I would get off this thread.

Edited May 3, 2021 by Ben J. Kerman

granted,you succesfully retired from that megathread

I wish for a dozen of Blitzkrieg

Edited May 3, 2021 by BlackMesaSurvivor
goddamnit i forgot entirely my wish :/

Granted, you are transported back to 1940 and are an allied soldier killed by a dozen of bayonets wielded by a dozen Blitzkriegers.

What is Love? (this is a repeat question of my own)
